title: RequirementAtom
description: Formal definition of an atomic requirement for Audit-by-Design DSL.

actor.description: The entity performing the action (e.g. system, user, process).

modality.description: Defines the normative obligation according to RFC 2119.

action.description: Specifies what the actor must or must not do.

condition.description: Optional condition under which the action applies.

result.description: Expected outcome when the condition and action are fulfilled.
